titles.title: Department of Veterans Affairs Tribal Advisory Committee Act of 2018
A bill to establish the Department of Veterans Affairs Advisory Committee on Tribal and Indian Affairs, and for other purposes.
Department of Veterans Affairs Tribal Advisory Committee Act of 2018

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

bill.summary:
Department of Veterans Affairs Tribal Advisory Committee Act of 2018
This bill directs the Department of Veterans Affairs (VA) to establish the Advisory Committee on Tribal and Indian Affairs to advise the VA on matters relating to Indian tribes, tribal organizations, and Native American veterans.
